power.title: Battle Awareness
power.fluff: You can sense danger before the threat is fully realized
power.section: Trigger: You roll initiative and dislike the result
true Effect: You gain a +10 bonus to the triggering initiative check.

power.title: Bewitching Glare
power.fluff: You catch your enemy's eye just as the foe makes an attack, and what it sees in your gaze rattles it enough to interfere with its strike
power.section: Prerequisite: You must be eladrin.
Trigger: An enemy in the burst makes an attack roll against an ally you can see
true Effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to the triggering attack roll.
true If the triggering attack misses, you can pull the target up to 1 square, or up to 2 squares if it is marked by you.

power.title: Bodyguard's Readyness
power.fluff: You stand poised, ready to block attacks made against your allies with your shield, weapon, or failing all other options, with your body
power.section: true Effect: You assume the Bodyguard's Readyness stance.
true Until the stance ends, you can use the following action at-will, and must use it it every time you are able to, or the stance immediately ends:
true 1 Free Interrupt: Trigger:An ally adjacent to you takes damage; You reduce the damage by 5, then take damage equal to the reduction. You cannot reduce or avoid the damage you take.
true 2 Level 11: Reduce by 10.
true 2 Level 21: Reduce by 15.

power.title: Dauntless Endurance
power.fluff: You easily shake off a debilitating effect that would cripple another warrior
power.section: Trigger: You make a saving throw and dislike the result
true Effect: You reroll the triggering saving throw, but must use the second result.

power.title: Defensive Training
power.fluff: With a soldier's discipline, you steel yourself against attacks that would overcome a lesser person
power.section: true Effect: You assume the Defensive Training stance.
true Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will

power.title: Get Up!
power.fluff: The aid you provide gets a dying ally back on his or her feet

section.name: Target:
section.target: one dying ally adjacent to you

power.section: true Effect: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her recovery value, and then stand up from prone.

power.title: Ignore Weakness
power.fluff: A surge of inner strength helps you shrug off the lingering effects of your enemy's attacks
power.section: Trigger: You start your turn immobilized, slowed, or weakened by an effect that a save can end
true Effect: You make a saving throw against each triggering effect. You gain a +2 bonus to these saving throws if you are not bloodied.

power.title: Intimidating Reminder
power.fluff: Just the sight of your shield keeps the memory of its use fresh in the minds of your enemies
power.section: You can remain in the stance if you stop using a shield, but you cannot gain any benefit from it until you are again using a shield.
true Effect: You assume the Intimidating Reminder stance.
true Until the stance ends, enemies adjacent to you take a -2 penalty to Will.

true When you hit an enemy with a Fighter attack that requires you to be using a shield, the enemy takes a penalty to attack rolls with the first attack it makes before the end of your next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Wisdom modifier (minimum penalty -1).

power.title: Knight's Challenge
power.fluff: You point your weapon at your enemy, its allies now looking at it expectantly as it wavers between accepting your challenge and losing face before its comrades
power.section: true Effect: If the target's Will is equal to or lower than 12 + your level, you pull the target 2 squares, though you cannot pull the target into hindering or damaging terrain.
true If the target's Will is higher, you regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Line Breaker
power.fluff: You turn aside your enemies' attacks as you advance across the battlefield
power.section: Effect: You move up to your speed.
You have a +5 bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by this movement.

power.title: Line in the Sand
power.fluff: You trace a circle on the ground around you with your weapon, daring your enemies to enter
power.section: Requirement: You are not adjacent to any enemies.
true Effect: Close burst 1 The burst creates a zone of control until the end of the encounter. The zone also ends if you leave it.
true You have combat advantage against any enemy in the zone.

power.title: Makeshift Cover
power.fluff: You are used to snatching a piece of furniture, a body, or a discarded item to block an enemy's attack
power.section: 1 Brawler Training: You can also use this power if you are grabbing a creature.
Trigger: An enemy hits you with a close or melee attack
true Effect: You gain a bonus to AC and Reflex against the triggering attack equal to your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Rapid Advancement
power.fluff: Your physical training lets you surge quickly across the battlefield
power.section: Effect: You move a number of squares equal to your speed + your Constitution modifier.
1 Duelist Training: If you have a hand free, you can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Constitution modifier.
1 Shieldbearer Training: If you are using a shield, you can use your Wisdom modifier instead of your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Rejoin the Fray
power.fluff: Reinvigorated by an ally's healing, you rush back into the fray
power.section: Trigger: An ally uses a Healing power on you
true Effect: If you are prone, you stand up and shift up 1 square.
true If you are standing, you shift up to 3 squares.

power.title: Rock Steady
power.fluff: You sink your center of gravity into the ground below you and grit your teeth, going nowhere you if you don't want to
power.section: true Effect: You assume the Rock Steady stance.
true Until the stance ends, you gain the following effects:
true 1 You cannot be knocked prone.
true 1 The maximum distance of any pull, push or slide you are subject to is reduced by a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half your Constitution modifier.
true 1 For the purposes of Fighter powers, you count as having expended 2 more healing surges than you actually have expended.
true 1 Your speed is halved. This does not stack with being slowed, use whichever gives you the slower speed.
Special: You can end this stance as a free action on your turn, but not on the same turn you activated it.

power.title: Settling the Score
power.fluff: When an enemy attacks you, you decide then and there to take it out
power.section: Trigger: An enemy attacks you
true Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to all attack rolls against the triggering enemy until the end of the encounter.

power.title: Steeling Roar
power.fluff: You let out an explosive roar, diverting your enemies' attentions to you while steeling you against the imminent assault

section.name: Target:
section.target: each enemy in the burst who can hear you

power.section: true Effect: You mark each target until the end of your next turn.

true In addition, you gain resist against all damage until the end of your next turn. The resist depends on the weapon you wield, or if you're using a shield. If multiple options apply, use the one that grants you the highest resist.
true 1 Axe, Hammer, Pick, or Mace: Equal to your Constitution modifier.
true 1 Flail, Heavy Blade, Light Blade, or Spear: Equal to your Dexterity modifier.
true 1 Polearm or Staff: Equal to your Wisdom modifier.
true 1 Shield: Equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
true 1 Level 11: The resist increases by +4.
true 1 Level 21: The resist increases by +8.

power.title: Strong Focus
power.fluff: Concentration improves your ability to accomplish feats of strength
power.section: true Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a power bonus to Atheletics checks and Strength checks. The bonus equals 2 + one-half your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Unbalancing Dodge
power.fluff: You duck out of the way of your foe's attack, putting the creature off balance
power.section: Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
true Effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to AC and Reflex. The penalty lasts until the end of the target's next turn.
true 1 Shield: You can choose to apply the penalty to the target's attack rolls instead.

power.title: Unbreakable
power.fluff: You steel yourself againsta a brutal attack
power.section: Trigger: You take damage.
true Effect: The triggering damage is reduced by one-half your level + your Constitution modifier.
true 1 Shieldbearer Training: If you are using a shield, you can use your Wisdom modifier instead of your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Veteran Gambit
power.fluff: By recognizing your enemy's tactics, you effortlessly predict the foe's next move
power.section: Trigger: An enemy targets you with a melee attack
true Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the triggering enemy. The bonus lasts until the end of the triggering enemy's next turn.

power.title: Vigilant Protector
power.fluff: You sweep your shield out to give your allies protection
power.section: You can remain in the stance if you stop using a shield, but you cannot gain any benefit from it until you are again using a shield.
Effect: You assume the Vigilant Protector stance.
Until the stance ends, you take a -1 penalty to AC and Reflex, but your allies gain a +2 bonus to AC and Reflex while adjacent to you.
1 Dragonborn: If you are a dragonborn with the Dragonborn Fury racial trait and you are bloodied, the bonus increases to +3.
